function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 outbreak raising public attention to workplace safety","Impact":"Risk of contagion and transmission in the workplace, potential impact on employee health","Mitigation":"Review and develop workplace policies, modify workspace, provide management services to adapt to the new normal","Technologies":"Remote working tools, contact tracing and monitoring technology, sanitization and disinfection technology","People":"Employees, visitors, contractors","Owner":"Organizations, workplace management teams"},{"Description":"Adapting to community measures and guidelines","Impact":"Diverse responses from different organizations, potential inconsistency in workplace modification activities","Mitigation":"Align workplace modification activities with public and industrial guidelines, adopt standardized frameworks for analysis","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, workplace monitoring technology, communication platforms for information sharing","People":"Workplace managers, health and safety teams","Owner":"Organizations, health and safety teams"},{"Description":"Development of workplace modification framework","Impact":"Need to collect and verify empirical data to support the framework","Mitigation":"Develop and implement data collection strategies, conduct empirical research to validate the framework","Technologies":"Data collection tools, survey and interview platforms, statistical analysis software","People":"Researchers, workplace analysts, data collectors","Owner":"Research organizations, workplace management teams"}]}
